about_the_game:
Change Up The Battlefield With These Fun Cosmetic Changes:

Wholesome Slaughter - Deluxe Edition is a cosmetic add on to the base game Wholesome Slaughter. This edition of the game will allow players to toggle between a new party hat unicorn enemy appearance, confetti blood and candy explosion effects!
detailed_description:
Change Up The Battlefield With These Fun Cosmetic Changes:

Wholesome Slaughter - Deluxe Edition is a cosmetic add on to the base game Wholesome Slaughter. This edition of the game will allow players to toggle between a new party hat unicorn enemy appearance, confetti blood and candy explosion effects!
name: Wholesome Slaughter - Deluxe Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 240 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 240 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse Only

short_description: Wholesome Slaughter - Deluxe Edition is a cosmetic add on to the base game Wholesome Slaughter. Help support the creators directly and in return, receive Party Hat Unicorn, Confetti Blood, and Candy Explosions!
